alert.note: Alert for Niagara (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NIAGARA COUNTY THROUGH 1215 AM EDT... At 1129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Lockport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lockport, Newfane, Sanborn, Wilson, Barker, Cambria Center, Olcott, Pendleton Center, Ransomville, Rapids, Gasport, Wolcottsville, Model City, and Appleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
